mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRD_SERV_APP SER, CRD_SERV_SUGG SUG WHERE SER.SERV_ID = SUG.SERV_ID AND SER.CUSTOMER_ID= #{mem_id} AND PROGRESS_CODE IN ('STU0040001','STU0050001','STU0050002') AND SUG.CHOOSE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT SERV_ID, PROGRESS_CODE , ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, SERV_DATE, PER_BUD , COMPANY_NAME, SUGG_ID FROM (SELECT A.*,ROWNUM AS NUM FROM( SELECT SERV.SERV_ID SERV_ID, SERV.PROGRESS_CODE PROGRESS_CODE , SERV.ADDRESS ADDRESS , SERV.ADDRESS_DETAIL ADDRESS_DETAIL, TO_CHAR(SERV.SERV_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SERV_DATE, SERV.PER_BUD AS PER_BUD, SUGG.NAME AS COMPANY_NAME, SERVSUGG.SUGG_ID AS SUGG_ID FROM CRD_SERV_APP SERV , CRD_COMPANY SUGG, CRD_SERV_SUGG SERVSUGG WHERE SERV.CUSTOMER_ID = #{mem_id} AND SERV.SERV_ID = SERVSUGG.SERV_ID AND SERVSUGG.CHOOSE_YN = 'Y' AND SERV.PROGRESS_CODE IN ('STU0040001','STU0050001','STU0050002') AND SUGG.MEM_ID = SERVSUGG.MEM_ID ORDER BY SERV_DATE DESC ) A )WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum} ORDER BY SERV_ID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CRD_SERV_APP SET PROGRESS_CODE='STU0060001', END_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE SERV_ID = #{serv_id}
